---
title: "Bigger or better: The relative benefits of protected area network expansion and enforcement for the conservation of an exploited species"
author: "Kuempel, Adams, Possingham, Bode"
editor: visual
date: "December 9, 2017"

#### The published [paper](https://conbio.onlinelibrary.wiley.com/doi/full/10.1111/conl.12433) and [code](https://doi.org/10.5281/zenodo.1068314) are available on-line.

In this paper, we developed a theoretical model to understand whether it is better to increase management in existing protected areas or expand the protected area network to conserve an exploited species.

![Schematic of population model, credit Kuempel et al. 2017](kuempel_2017.png)
